title: Runes wont load and probably ill lose
body:
What is happening
Edit: I DONT HAVE FREAKING RUNES IN GAME WHAT IS THIS RIOT 
Edit 2:Played the game and i automatically got comet,won it,restarted the client and the same thing keeps happening..

replies.body: Usually this happens when the client wasn't able to download your rune page settings from the server, generally caused by hiccups in your connection. Try updating your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4, but I'd also go ahead and add [**firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) for League while you're at it.
